name: Breaking News API
title: Breaking News API
description: The USA TODAY Breaking News API provides a method for developers to retrieve our breaking news content. Data is presented in an RSS format, with headline, summary text and URLs for the web and mobile sites.

Breaking News.description: Retrieves breaking news content. Please note that the breaking new APIS supports only RSS format

expired.description: Breaking News items expire (usually after 30 minutes). By default, the Breaking News API only returns unexpired news alerts, and thus, it is often empty. Use expired=true if you wish to return the 10 most recent Breaking News items, regardless of expiration.
